ğŸ Swift êµ¬í˜„

// 1. Protocol ì •ì˜ (ì¶”ìƒí™”)
protocol NetworkService {
    func fetch(url: String) async throws -> Data
}

protocol UserRepository {
    func getUser(id: Int) async throws -> User
}

// 2. êµ¬í˜„ì²´
class URLSessionNetworkService: NetworkService {
    func fetch(url: String) async throws -> Data {
        // URLSessionì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ ë¡œì§
    }
}

class DefaultUserRepository: UserRepository {
    private let networkService: NetworkService

    // ìƒì„±ì ì£¼ì…
    init(networkService: NetworkService) {
        self.networkService = networkService
    }

    func getUser(id: Int) async throws -> User {
        let data = try await networkService.fetch(url: "/users/\(id)")
        return try JSONDecoder().decode(User.self, from: data)
    }
}

// 3. DI Container (ìˆ˜ë™ êµ¬ì„±)
class DIContainer {
    static let shared = DIContainer()

    lazy var networkService: NetworkService = {
        URLSessionNetworkService()
    }()

    lazy var userRepository: UserRepository = {
        DefaultUserRepository(networkService: networkService)
    }()
}

// 4. ì‚¬ìš©
let repository = DIContainer.shared.userRepository
let user = try await repository.getUser(id: 123)

â˜• Java êµ¬í˜„

// 1. Interface ì •ì˜ (ì¶”ìƒí™”)
public interface NetworkService {
    CompletableFuture<String> fetch(String url);
}

public interface UserRepository {
    CompletableFuture<User> getUser(int id);
}

// 2. êµ¬í˜„ì²´
@Service
public class RestTemplateNetworkService implements NetworkService {
    @Override
    public CompletableFuture<String> fetch(String url) {
        // RestTemplateì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ ë¡œì§
    }
}

@Repository
public class DefaultUserRepository implements UserRepository {
    private final NetworkService networkService;

    // ìƒì„±ì ì£¼ì… (Springì´ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ì£¼ì…)
    @Autowired
    public DefaultUserRepository(NetworkService networkService) {
        this.networkService = networkService;
    }

    @Override
    public CompletableFuture<User> getUser(int id) {
        return networkService.fetch("/users/" + id)
            .thenApply(data -> parseUser(data));
    }
}

// 3. Configuration (ì„ íƒì )
@Configuration
public class AppConfig {
    // í•„ìš”ì‹œ Bean ì§ì ‘ ì •ì˜ ê°€ëŠ¥
}

// 4. ì‚¬ìš©
@Service
public class UserService {
    @Autowired
    private UserRepository userRepository; // ìë™ ì£¼ì…

    public User getUserById(int id) {
        return userRepository.getUser(id).join();
    }
}
